widget.name: WinJS.UI.Rating
widget.description: The Rating control allows users to give a number on a scale of 1 to maxRating (5 is the default).

property.name: maxRating
property.description: Gets or sets the maximum possible rating value. The default is 5.

property.name: userRating
property.description: Gets or sets the user's rating. This value must be between greater than or equal to zero and less than or equal to the maxRating.

property.name: averageRating
property.description: Gets or sets the average rating as a float value. This value must be [equal to zero] OR [greater than or equal to 1 AND less than or equal to the maxRating].

property.name: disabled
property.description: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the control is disabled. When the control is disabled, the user can't specify a new rating or modify an existing rating.

property.name: enableClear
property.description: Gets or sets whether the control lets the user clear the rating.

property.name: tooltipStrings
property.description: Gets or sets a set of descriptions to show for rating values in the tooltip. The array must contain a string for each available rating value, and it can contain an optional string (at the end of the array) for the clear rating option.

property.name: element
property.description: Gets the DOM element that hosts the Rating.

part.name: average-empty
part.description: The empty star when the Rating control shows the average rating.

part.name: average-full
part.description: The full star when the Rating control shows the average rating.

part.name: user-empty
part.description: The empty star when the Rating control shows the user rating.

part.name: user-full
part.description: The full star when the Rating control shows the user rating.

part.name: tentative-empty
part.description: The empty star when the Rating control shows the tentative rating.

part.name: tentative-full
part.description: The full star when the Rating control shows the tentative rating.

part.name: disabled-empty
part.description: The empty star when the control is disabled.

part.name: disabled-full
part.description: The full star when the control is disabled.
